params.text: Lona ngu–Abi nonodoli wakhe.
U–Abi uthanda unodoli wakhe.
U–Abi uthanda ukudlala ngonodoli wakhe.
U–Abi ulahlekelwe unodoli wakhe.
U–Abi ufuna unodoli wakhe.
Ubheka ngaphansi kwetafula.
Ubheka ngaphansi kwesihlalo.
Ubheka engadini.
“ Uphi unodoli wami? ”  U–Abi ebuza ikati.
“ Meow, ” kusho ikati.
“ Uphi unodoli wami? ”  U–Abi ebuza isikhukhukazi.
“ Ku - ku - ku, ” kusho isikhukhukazi.
“ Uphi unodoli wami?”  U–Abi ebuza inja.
“ Woof woof woof ” kusho inja. Inja yamthola unodoli.

"Umdoli Lolahlekile" credits

This work, "Umdoli Lolahlekile", is a derivative of "The Lost Doll" as translated by Alisha Berger and used under CC BY. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. "The Lost Doll" is based on the original story: 'Umdoli Lolahlekile', by Moleboge Shibboleth Poho. © Room to Read, 2015.

This work, "The Lost Doll" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
